title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H1 – Mar 3 2022
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H1 – Mar 3 2022
description:
Buck and Clay from Houston, hosted by affiliate KTRH, on a busy broadcast day of fact-checking lying Biden. "Our current commander-in-chief" amazingly blames Ukraine on 1/6, falsely says riot killed 5 cops. Worldwide elites are recklessly encouraging mass anti-Russia hysteria, ignoring danger of Putin's nukes. Another lie: Biden falsely claims he cut the deficit. Former Trump economic advisor and Fox Business host Larry Kudlow joins Clay and Buck to discuss Russia, China and how Biden has destroyed American energy independence, says Trump would have rattled Putin's cage, prevented Ukraine invasion. NFL drops all covid protocols.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
